[vc_row row_btt_skin=”light” row_background_text_position=”front”][vc_column]

REBATES [vc_empty_space height=”50px” el_id=”top-space”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_btt_skin=”light” row_background_text_position=”front” el_class=”main-column”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Home Renovation Rebate Programs in Greater Victoria

At 4 Seasons, we are committed to informing customers about all their options when replacing or upgrading their home heating equipment, which is why we inform and encourage our customers to take advantage of any and all rebates available. Please see the current rebates offered in the Greater Victoria area listed below:

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” css=”.vc_custom_1566152058706{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

* Maximum one system is eligible for either bonus

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Bonus and Special Offers

Two Upgrade Bonus

Install any two of the above upgrades and receive a $300 Bonus

Home Energy Improvement Bonus

Pre and post- Upgrade EnerGuide home evaluation required
Install any three of the above and receive $20 per % GJ change based on your EnerGuide report Maximum rebate is $2,000

EnerGuide Home Evaluation Rebate

$300 for completing a pre and post- Upgrade EnerGuide home evaluation.
This rebate is funded in part by the Province of British Columbia and Government of Canada

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

Natural Gas Fireplace Rebate

If you buy a new natural gas fireplace, insert or freestanding stove and upgrade to an eligible Ener-Choice® model, you will get a rebate of $300.
Conditions to be met to get the rebate:
1. You should be:
a. A residential natural gas customer and FortisBC gas account holder, or
b. The owner of a strata unit in FortisBC’s gas service area.
2. The purchase of your EnerChoice® fireplace should be mentioned in the eligible fireplace list.
The rebate is on selected EnerChoice® models.
3. Your application should be postmarked within 60 days of the purchase date.
Rebate on Replacing a Wood Stove
The Province of BC and local communities offers rebates on exchanging wood stoves with cleaner burning options like natural gas fireplaces. Such rebates are independent of FortisBC and have their own eligibility criteria

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

Natural Gas Furnace & Boiler Rebates

If you replace your old natural gas furnace or boiler with an eligible ENERGY STAR® model, you will get a $500 rebate on a boiler or up to $700 on a furnace.
• Rebate on 95 to 96.9 Percent Annual Fuel Utilization Efficiency (AFUE) Furnace
You will get $500 rebate on upgrading your old natural gas furnace to 95 to 96.9 percent AFUE furnace.
• Rebate on 97 to 99 Percent AFUE Gas Furnace
FortisBC® offers a rebate of $700 when you upgrade your furnace to 97 to 99 percent AFUE gas furnace.
• Rebate on 94 Percent or Higher AFUE Boiler
On upgrading your old boiler to 94 percent or higher AFUE boiler, you will get a rebate of $500.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

ENERGY STAR® Natural Gas Furnace or Boiler

Get a rebate of $1300 without any additional water heater rebate by installing a natural gas furnace or boiler from ENERGY STAR®.
Requirements
• Convert primary heating source from oil, propone or wood to natural gas
• Install an eligible furnace or boiler

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

ENERGY STAR® Natural Gas Furnace or Boiler and Standalone Water Heater

Install or replace your old water heater or boiler with the new ENERGY STAR® natural gas furnace or boiler and standalone water heater and you can get a rebate of $1700 and an additional water heater rebate from $200-$1000.
Requirements
• Convert primary heating source from oil, propone or wood to natural gas
• Install an eligible furnace or boiler and natural gas water heater that meets BC code requirements

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

Combination Heating and Hot Water System

If you install a combination of heating and hot water system you’ll get a rebate of $1700 and an additional water heater rebate of $1000.
Requirements
• Convert your primary heating source from oil, propane or wood to natural gas
• You need to install an eligible combination heating and hot water system
• Only condensing tankless water heaters models are applicable to this system so the additional rebate is $1,000

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

BC Hydro Heat Pump Rebate

Customers switching from oil, propane, or natural gas to an electric heat pump will be eligible for a rebate of $3,000 from BC Hydro. This new rebate is in addition to the CleanBC rebate, for a maximum total rebate of $6,000. Requirements apply, contact us for details.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”100px” el_class=”mobile-space”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
